title:
Explanation video of Shapes 
Circle 
Rectangle 
Tr...
subtitles:
```webvtt
WEBVTT

00:00.000 --> 00:02.000
Hello everyone! Let's learn about basic shapes.

00:02.000 --> 00:04.000
First, we have a circle. It's round like a ball!

00:04.000 --> 00:06.000
Next, a rectangle! It has four sides.

00:06.000 --> 00:08.000
Then, a triangle with three sides.

00:08.000 --> 00:10.000
See? We can use shapes to make a house!

00:10.000 --> 00:12.000
The triangle becomes the roof, and the square the base.

00:12.000 --> 00:13.500
Shapes are everywhere! Great job learning!
```

title: A introduction videos for shapes , For nursery stu...
subtitles:
```webvtt
WEBVTT

00:00.000 --> 00:02.000
Hello everyone! Let's learn about shapes!

00:02.000 --> 00:05.000
Today, we'll discover circles, squares, and triangles.

00:05.000 --> 00:08.000
First, let's meet the circle!

00:08.000 --> 00:10.000
A circle is round like a ball.

00:10.000 --> 00:13.000
Now, let's look at the square!

00:13.000 --> 00:16.000
A square has four sides that are all the same.

00:16.000 --> 00:19.000
Next up is the triangle!

00:19.000 --> 00:21.000
A triangle has three sides.

00:21.000 --> 00:24.000
So we have a circle, a square and a triangle!

00:24.000 --> 00:27.000
Can you find these shapes around you?

00:27.000 --> 00:30.000
Great job learning about shapes!

00:30.000 --> 00:32.000
You're a shape superstar!

00:32.000 --> 00:34.000
The End!
```

title: animation of snowing backgournd with text white sn...
subtitles:
```webvtt
WEBVTT

00:00.000 --> 00:04.000
Hello everyone! Let's learn how to make a simple snowing text animation!

00:04.000 --> 00:07.000
First, we'll create the title of our animation.

00:07.000 --> 00:11.000
Now, let's create our text that will look like it's snowing behind. We'll make it white.

00:11.000 --> 00:16.000
Next, we'll create many small white dots. These are our snowflakes!

00:16.000 --> 00:21.000
We'll place these snowflakes randomly at the top of the screen.

00:21.000 --> 00:26.000
Now, for the magic! We'll make the snowflakes fall down the screen.

00:26.000 --> 00:31.000
Each snowflake moves a little bit differently, making it look more realistic.

00:31.000 --> 00:35.000
Notice how the flakes appear *behind* the white text?

00:35.000 --> 00:39.000
The snowflakes moving down create a simple, falling animation.

00:39.000 --> 00:42.000
The arrow shows the direction the snowflakes are moving: DOWN!

00:42.000 --> 00:47.000
So, in short, we created white snowflakes falling behind white text!

00:47.000 --> 00:50.000
And that's how you make a basic snowing text animation. Thanks for watching!
```

title: Introduction of shapes for Nursery students (Basic...
subtitles:
```webvtt
WEBVTT

00:00.000 --> 00:02.000
Hello, boys and girls! Let's learn about shapes!

00:02.000 --> 00:05.000
Today, we're going to discover some fun shapes.

00:05.000 --> 00:08.000
First, let's meet the circle!

00:08.000 --> 00:11.000
A circle is round, just like a ball or a cookie!

00:11.000 --> 00:13.000
Can you say "Circle"?

00:13.000 --> 00:16.000
Next, we have the square!

00:16.000 --> 00:19.000
A square has four sides, and all sides are the same!

00:19.000 --> 00:21.000
Can you say "Square"?

00:21.000 --> 00:24.000
Now, let's meet the triangle!

00:24.000 --> 00:27.000
A triangle has three sides, like a slice of pizza!

00:27.000 --> 00:29.000
Can you say "Triangle"?

00:29.000 --> 00:33.000
And finally, we have the rectangle!

00:33.000 --> 00:37.000
A rectangle has four sides too, but two sides are long, and two are short!

00:37.000 --> 00:39.000
Can you say "Rectangle"?

00:39.000 --> 00:43.000
Great job! We learned about the circle, the square, the triangle, and the rectangle!

00:43.000 --> 00:45.000
You are all shape experts now!

00:45.000 --> 00:47.000
Keep exploring the world around you to find more shapes.

00:47.000 --> 00:49.000
Good job, everyone!
```
